name: Peppy Cat 2
description:
***If you have very good skills, it fits you! (ó■ò)
***Enjoy playing it with your nimble fingers!
-Tap anywhere to jump.
-Tap more times rapidly to jump higher.
-Avoid the colorful spore viruses.

Peppy Cat 2 is series of Peppy Cat games.
Hope you enjoy this Peppy Cat 2 :)
Thank you!
